Posts.Content: Sep 11, 2013 05:36AM Jupiterjo wrote: I too am sorry to hear you had such a rough experience! Yes, insist on ultrasound, have them bill you if you have to but yes, get it done. My surgeon recommended a Valium before my biopsy (I'm 53, diagnosed March 2013; had double mastectomy w/ immediate reconstruction in May 2013; stage 2b w/ 2 of 3 lymph nodes removed, chemo started June & now on weekly Taxol for 12 weeks). Nurse at radiologists office asked "do you think you really need the Valium?" Ummmm - yes!!! Made me relax & not focus on what was going on, I so sorry for your very rough experience!!! Hang in there - praying for you!
Posts.Title: Should I insist on ultrasound of the other breast? cactus cactus
